divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 12am my boyfriend called me outside because he saw a star like object that didn't sem quite right to him. It appeared to have a tail and was moving in a small loop. It was brighter than a star and had a reddish tint to it, sometimes blue.. It appeared to be bouncing off of the atmosphere, we thought it could be a comet or something, possibly headed into the atmoshere. another thought was that it could be an alien-craft or perhaps an ICBM missile. About 45 min. later I spotted a second one. it was moving much slower but doing the same thing..
Summary: 2 star like objects. Twinkling brighter and faster than stars. doing barely noticable loops. they appeared to be bouncing off of the atmosphere.
trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There were no other sightings in Boise on or around September 15th 2007
